name: Slalom (itch) (master both)
description:
If the controls are not working refresh the page (if it still happens, refresh and try fullscreen mode)!!!

  • My entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2019!
    The theme was "Only One", to which I decided to not restrict the player or game, but me! So I gave myself 1 hour to make the game (because I didn't have much time to actually do the game jam).
  • Controls:
    • Press and hold "right" or "d" to move the player right.
    Press and hold "left" or "a" to move the player left.

  • Pro tip: Be sure to swing from side to side to get momentum!
